clips.what_happens_visually: A robotic deer with antlers walks down a road. Erlich kicks it. The robot deer falls over.
clips.dialogue_hook:
Fucking piece of shit!
Your little cunt!
clips.meme_caption:
When your AI-powered
startup hits a snag
clips.why_it_works: Physical comedy of kicking a robot deer is funny, relatable to the frustration of building something new.

clips.what_happens_visually: Erlich walks into an office, meets a bald man with glasses, and they shake hands.
clips.dialogue_hook:
We meet at last.
Mr. Bachman.
clips.meme_caption:
VCs after you get
that YC funding
clips.why_it_works: The awkward handshake and forced niceties are relatable to anyone who's met a VC.

clips.what_happens_visually: Erlich lists off a bunch of random things, then says 'Liking Ike?' The bald man looks confused.
clips.meme_caption:
When you try to vibe
code with the VC
clips.why_it_works: The juxtaposition of random things and 'liking ike' is funny, and the bald man's reaction sells it.

clips.what_happens_visually: A man in an orange jumpsuit is talking to Richard in a jail cell. He has a black eye and cuts on his face.
clips.dialogue_hook: Next thing I knew I was 70 miles away wrapped naked in a blanket shaking off a meth high.
clips.news_hook:
When you try to estimate
story points
clips.why_it_works: The absurdity of the line is funny, and the visual of the man in jail sells it.

clips.what_happens_visually: Erlich is holding a bong and says, 'At least the actual Judas had the courtesy to kill himself after betraying his leader, Jesus Christ'
clips.dialogue_hook: At least the actual Judas had the courtesy to kill himself after betraying his leader, Jesus Christ
clips.meme_caption:
When your co-founder
leaves for a FAANG
clips.why_it_works: The over-the-top reaction and religious comparison are funny, and relatable to the pain of losing a co-founder.

clips.what_happens_visually: Erlich opens the fridge, revealing a bunch of coconut water. He takes one and drinks it.
clips.dialogue_hook: Would you care for another coconut water? They are the most expensive unpasteurized variety.
clips.meme_caption:
When the startup raises
Series A
clips.why_it_works: The visual of the fridge full of coconut water is funny, and relatable to the perks that come with a startup raising money.

clips.what_happens_visually: A man in a suit is giving a presentation with a bulldog sitting on the desk. He points to the bulldog and says, 'Look at that hideous face.'
clips.dialogue_hook:
Look at that hideous face!
Alright, get it out of here.
clips.why_it_works: The juxtaposition of the man in a suit and the bulldog is funny, and relatable to the self-deprecating humor of engineers.

clips.what_happens_visually: The scene cuts to a fancy hotel. Richard is checking in with a black bag. He sees a man he knows.
clips.dialogue_hook:
You here fucking?
No, no no fucking. Just here for the Vanity Fair dinner.
clips.meme_caption:
When you're at a
conference but you're single
clips.news_hook:
The real reason to attend
AI Dev World
clips.why_it_works: The awkward exchange is funny, and relatable to the social dynamics of attending a conference.
